TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEventCustomEvaluator

summary.span: 評估事件是否要傳送給相關的提供者以進行處理。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be sent to the related provider for processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 這個介面允許啟用或停用特定事件的引發。This interface allows enabling or disabling the firing of a specific event. 當您實作您自己的自訂事件，而且想要控制的速率，它傳送至相關的提供者進行處理時，這是特別有用。This is especially useful when you implement your own custom event and want to control the rate at which it is sent to the related provider for processing. > [!NOTE] > 這個介面不會控制此事件的引發頻率。This interface does not control how often the event is raised. 它只會控制事件資訊傳送給提供者處理的頻率。It only controls how often the event information is sent to the provider for processing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自介面時建立自訂事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the interface when creating a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下列是允許使用 ASP.NET 的組態檔的摘錄方法，以決定是否引發的事件必須傳送至提供者進行處理。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the method to decide whether the raised event must be sent to the provider for processing. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CanFire (System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent raisedEvent, System.Web.Management.RuleFiringRecord record);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanFire(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent raisedEvent, class System.Web.Management.RuleFiringRecord record) cil managed
Public Function CanFire (raisedEvent As WebBaseEvent, record As RuleFiringRecord) As Boolean

span.span: The containing information about the event.

summary.span: 評估事件是否應該引發。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be raised.

returns.span: 如果要引發事件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event should be raised; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回的自訂事件評估工具`true`，會引發事件，並接著會處理相關聯的提供者。If the custom event evaluator returns `true`, the event is raised and then processed by the associated provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的自訂實作方法。The following code example shows a custom implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#22)]
